channel.title: [F2P] Runescape Money Making Guide (100-250k per hour)
channel.description:
This is for people who are knew at runescape Don't flame please :( These methods are basic, Yet useful..
1. Mining clay You can mine clay in varrock located by the quest guild Mine the clay then sell OR you can make it yet and get about another 100-150 coins
2. Feathers I know this one is nooby but it's for training and money:) Tele to lumby and run across the bridge, start walking to fallador then you will come apon a feather cage, take the meat, bones, feathers 1 full load = around 7-11k
3. Fishing this requires 40+ fishing, This step is fishing lobby's which is easy. Go to karamja or w.e [you need 30 coins] 60 to get back You need a fishing cage also, when your there you can start fishing for lobsters! then rune east i think and talk to a man and he will note your lobsters Keep fishing till you die and or bored. :)
4. Bananas this is karamja also, Pick from the banana tree's and simply run back to closest bank and repeat
I hope this helped the new comers of runescape land:) I have not played rs in so long.. Well.. talk shit get her ^ Ignore that, Its kinda dumb.

item.title: [F2P] Runescape Money Making Guide (100-250k per hour)
item.description:
@410 wrote:

This is for people who are knew at runescape
Don’t flame please
These methods are basic, Yet useful…

  1. Mining clay
    You can mine clay in varrock located by the quest guild
    Mine the clay then sell OR you can make it yet and get about another 100-150 coins

  2. Feathers
    I know this one is nooby but it’s for training and money:)
    Tele to lumby and run across the bridge, start walking to fallador then you will come apon a feather cage,
    take the meat, bones, feathers 1 full load = around 7-11k

  3. Fishing
    this requires 40+ fishing, This step is fishing lobby’s which is easy.
    Go to karamja or w.e [you need 30 coins] 60 to get back
    You need a fishing cage also, when your there you can start fishing for lobsters! then rune east i think
    and talk to a man and he will note your lobsters
    Keep fishing till you die and or bored.

  4. Bananas
    this is karamja also, Pick from the banana tree’s and simply run back to closest bank and repeat

I hope this helped the new comers of runescape land:)
I have not played rs in so long…
Well…
talk shit get her
^ Ignore that, Its kinda dumb.
